txt.en: 'Ah, such a relief! You really helped me out today.'
The crafting recipe for the banners of the newly-wed can be bartered for from the marriage-wright, Melthend.\n\nBanner of the newly-wed kits can be earned by completing Midsummer quests in Bree-town.

'Excuse me, but you seem like a handy sort and I need a little help. I'm expecting a shipment of banners of the newly-wed, but nothing has arrived. If you get your hands on some banner of the newly-wed kits, and some tailoring or woodworking skills, please make three banners and bring them to me.'
Deliver banners of the newly-wed to Melthend ([placeholder]/[placeholder])
A beleaguered marriage-wright, Melthend, has asked you to assemble some banners of the newly-wed for an upcoming ceremony.
Without a Hitch - Banners for the Newly-wed
